responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.

KMIT (Keshav Memorial Institute of Technology) is located in Hyderabad, India. KMIT is an autonomous engineering college affiliated with JNTU and offers undergraduate programs in various engineering disciplines.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure!

patterns: What is the objective of Project School?
Can you explain the ultimate goal of Project School?
How does Project School enhance students' skills?
Explain the eligibility criteria for Project School.
responses: Project School aims to provide a well-rounded skill set with hands-on project experience. The goal is to integrate multiple technologies and enhance students' technical abilities. Eligibility is open to all students, selected based on a programming languages machine test. Students form teams of 5 members once selected for Project School.

patterns: How are students selected for Project School?
What is the process for selecting students for Project School?
Explain the criteria for allotting seats in Project School.
responses: Students are selected based on performance in a machine test on programming languages. Seats are allotted based on test scores and availability.

patterns: Tell me about the student committee
responses: The Student Committee includes OC (Organizing Committee) and PR (Public Relations), playing key roles in organizing events and enhancing college communication. Here are the links for their IG handles:

patterns: Tell me about the student body
responses: KMITRA is the student body at KMIT, responsible for the college's e-magazine and promoting literary and creative works within the student community.Visit the instagram account for more updates of it's activities
External bodies of the college include NSS (National Service Scheme), Rotaract, and Street Cause. These organizations focus on community service and social impact beyond the college campus.

patterns: Tell me about the student clubs
What's Kaivalya, Aalap, Abhinaya, Aakarshan, Curiosity, Mudra, Recurse, Vachan, Kreeda, Traces of Lenses, Riti?
responses: Student clubs include Kaivalya (Yoga), Aalap (Music), Abhinaya (Drama), Aakarshan (Art), Curiosity, Mudra (Dance), Recurse (Coding), Vachan (Speaker's Club), Kreeda (Sports), Traces of Lenses (Photography), and Riti (Fashion). These clubs provide platforms for diverse interests and talents.

patterns: Tell me about KMIT's learning management system.

patterns: List sister colleges of this college
where are the sister college located
responses: NGIT, KMEC,KMCE are the sister colleges of KMIT located in Uppal, Peerzadiguda, and Chintpalliguda respectively

patterns: What are the founding year of this college ?
when was keshav memorial institue of technology founded
responses: KMIT was established in the year 2007

patterns: when was neil gogte institue of technology founded
responses: NGIT is a sister concern of KMIT  affiliated to Osmania University (O.U), started in 2017

patterns: when was keshav memorial engineering college founded
responses: Keshav Memorial Engineering College KMEC is a sister concern of KMIT  affiliated to Osmania University (O.U), started in 2021

patterns: when was keshav memorial college of engineering founded
responses: Keshav Memorial College of Engineering  is a sister concern of KMIT affiliated to JNTU, started in 2023

patterns: Who are the founders of KMIT?
Founding members of Keshav Memorial Institute of Technology
responses: The founders of KMIT are Mr. Neil Gogte and Mr. Nitin Sahasrabudhe.

patterns: Tell me about Mr. Neil Gogte
responses: Mr. Neil Gogte is the Founder Director of KMIT. He holds a Masters Degree in Computer Science from IIT - Mumbai and a B.E. degree from Osmania University. With over 25 years of experience in the IT industry, he is a visionary technocrat and entrepreneur.

patterns: Tell me about Mr. Nitin Sahasrabudhe
responses: Mr. Nitin Sahasrabudhe is the Director of Genesis Solutions Pvt. Ltd. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Electronics & Communications Engineering. With over 25 years of experience, he has worked in project and product sales in Healthcare and IT Industries.

patterns: Who are the HODs at KMIT?
Check HODs at Keshav Memorial Institute of Technology
responses: For information about the HODs at KMIT, visit

patterns: What advantages does this college offer?
How is this college beneficial for students?
Tell me about the advantages of joining this college.
Why is this college a good choice?
What are the strengths of this college?
responses: This college provides unique advantages through special programs like Project School and Finishing School. Students gain practical skills, competitive edge, and industry preparation, making it an ideal choice for holistic development.
KMIT campus is located in Narayanaguda, a central locality in the city of Hyderabad.

patterns: Can you list the strengths of this college?
why should i join this college
What are the special initiatives of this college?
responses: Our college stands out with special initiatives like Project School and Finishing School. Project School aims for well-rounded skills and hands-on experience, while Finishing School offers diverse tracks including coding, aptitude, and soft skills.

patterns: Does the campus have a hostel?
Where can I stay if I join this college?
Are there any residential facilities on campus?
Can I get a room in the hostel?
Are there any PGs or hostels near the college?
responses: Our college does not have any residential facilities or hostels. However, there are many private hostels and PG accommodations available near the college premises.

patterns: How can I travel to the college?
What are the transportation options for the college?
Do I need to arrange my own transport to the college?
responses: Our college does not provide any buses or transportation. However, you can reach the college via Narayanaguda metro station or Narayanaguda bus stop.

patterns: How are the placements in the college?

What percentage of students get placed every year?
Tell me about the college placements.
What is the average salary package ?
Are there any internships offered during placements?
How many companies visited last year?
how many students were placed last year
responses: Our college has a dedicated placement cell-Bhavishya Dwar that invites various reputed companies for campus placements. For specific details about the companies, packages, and percentage of students placed, please follow the link:

patterns: Where is the nearest parking lot?
Can you guide me to the parking area?
Where can I park my vehicle?
Is there a designated parking area?
responses: The parking is located near the B-block. It has spots for both cars and bikes.

patterns: Can I park my vehicle on campus?
Is there a parking lot in the college?
Can I park my bike on campus?
responses: Yes, parking is available on campus. We have provisions for both 2 wheeler and 4 wheeler parking.

patterns: Can you tell me the EAMCET cutoff?
I need to know the EAMCET cutoff.
What is the cutoff for EAMCET?
Could you inform me about the EAMCET cutoff?
responses: Our college is one of the top 10 institutions in the state. The EAMCET cutoff varies each year. For detailed information, please visit our official website:

patterns: What courses does the college offer?
Can you tell me the courses offered by the college?
I need to know the courses offered in the college.
What are the courses offered in the college?
What are the major courses in the college?
I want to know about the college courses.
Tell me about the courses in the college.
What kind of courses are offered in the college?
responses: Our college offers a variety of courses. They include Computer Science Engineering (CSE), Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in AI and ML (CSM), Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Data Science (CSD), and Information Technology (IT). For detailed information about these courses, please visit our official website.

patterns: What accreditations does the college have?
Can you tell me the accreditations of the college?
I need to know the college's accreditations.
What are the major accreditations of the college?
responses: Our college is autonomous and is accredited by several prestigious organizations. These include the National Board of Accreditation (NBA), the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF), the Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA), and the National Innovation Council (NIC). For detailed information about these accreditations, please visit our official website.

patterns: When does the Finishing School start?
Can you tell me when the Finishing School starts and its duration?
What is the duration of the Finishing School?
Can you list the start and end dates of the Finishing School?
What is the schedule for the Finishing School?
responses: The Finishing School program consists of two semesters. The first semester of the Finishing School runs concurrently with the third year second semester of B.Tech while the second semester runs concurrently with the fourth year, first semester. A student has the choice to opt for various tracks offered.

patterns: What tracks are offered in the Finishing School?
Can you tell me the tracks offered in the Finishing School?
What are the tracks in the Finishing School?
What kind of tracks are offered in the Finishing School?
responses: The Finishing School offers a variety of tracks. These include: Foundation Track: C, C++, Core and Advanced Java, RDBMS, OS fundamentals.Aptitude Skills: Quantitative Techniques, Verbal Ability, Reasoning, Puzzles, General Knowledge, Group Discussion: General Interest, Creative topics, Education, Social Topics etc., ELearning: Video Sessions are available online, enabling concept revision. Soft Skills: Resume Writing, Interview Preparation, Business

patterns: Can you tell me about the FDS?
I need to know about the Foundation School.
Tell me something about the Foundation School.
responses: Foundation School (FDS) is a program that focuses on improving and enhancing the coding skills of students of the first and second years. These sessions are apart from the regular University classes.

patterns: When are the Foundation School sessions?
How often are the Foundation School sessions?
What is the schedule for the Foundation School sessions?
Can you tell me the timing of the Foundation School sessions?
What's the frequency of the Foundation School sessions?
responses: Students will have FDS coding sessions 2 hours per day, thrice a week for the complete semester.

patterns: What do students do in the Foundation School sessions?
What kind of problems are given in the Foundation School sessions?
What is the curriculum of the Foundation School?
What do the Foundation School sessions involve?
What's the learning process in the Foundation School sessions?
responses: During these sessions, students are given challenging coding problems and are encouraged to solve them. Faculty mentors too are available in the class for those students who need help.

patterns: what fun programs happen in kmit
what fun events will there be in kmit
responses: In KMIT, we have 3 major events throughout the year: Patangotsav, Dandiya Night, KMIT Evening
